price: 31.Tokkel ni-Rabbih maxcó inkih nel nummatteh, diggah nee kee sin digaalá tammoysenno.
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
